ProductDetail.PageTitle: Kick in the Head on DVD from makitCommerce
ProductDetail.MetaDescription: DVD of Kick in the Head from makitCommerce
ProductDetail.MetaKeywords: kick in the head, dvd, film, makit, makitCommerce
ProductDetail.ProductShortDescription: A high petrol adventure containing a guy who likes to kick... in the head.
ProductDetail.ProductLongDescription: Jeremy "Head-Kicker" Udder goes on a mission to kick all the people he doesn't like in the head. Contains a big actor in a poster on the wall of one scene. Viewers must be 18 or over.
